There's an urgent matter at home." Xue Ke asked, "What's the matter?" The family members replied, "We'll tell you at home." Xue Ke didn't even have time to say goodbye and left. Xue Pai Mama, hearing the news from the maids, turned pale with fright and quickly stood up, accompanied by Baoqin, bidding farewell, and immediately returned home. This caused great surprise among everyone inside and outside. The old lady said, "We'll send someone over to see what's going on, and everyone is very concerned." Everyone agreed.

They cried and asked, "Who is it -" The family members returned, "Madam, you don't have to ask about the details now. Whoever it is, he will be sentenced to death if he is killed. Let's discuss how to handle it." Xue Yimei cried and came out, "There is no need to discuss." paragraphs.original: 大哥人命是误伤，不是故杀。今早用蝌出名，补了一张呈纸进去，尚未批出。大哥前头口供甚是不好。待此纸批准后，再录一堂，能够翻供得好，便可得生了。快向当铺内再取银五百两来使用，千万莫迟！并请太太放心。馀事问小厮。
paragraphs.english: Brother, you were accidentally injured, not intentionally killed. I used toads to win a big case this morning, and I submitted an application for it, but it has not been approved yet. Brother, your previous testimony was not good. After this application is approved, record a new statement, if you can change the statement, you can be saved. Please go to the pawnshop to get another five hundred taels of silver, don't be late! Please rest assured, your wife. Other things ask the footman.
paragraphs.chinese: 大哥，你被误伤了，不是故意杀人的。今天早上我用蝌蚪打了一个有名的官司，补了一张申请书进去，还没有批下来。大哥，你之前的口供不太好。等这个申请书批准后，再录一次口供，如果能改口供，就可以得救了。快去当铺里再取五百两银子来用，千万别迟了！请太太放心。其他的事情问小厮。

paragraphs.original: 宝钗看了，一一念给薛姨妈听了。薛姨妈拭著眼泪，说道：“这么看起来，竟是死活不定了！”宝钗道：“妈妈先别伤心，等著叫进小厮来问明了再说。”一面打发小丫头把小厮叫进来。薛姨妈便问小厮道：“你把大爷的事细说与我听听。”小厮道：“我那一天晚上，听见大爷和二爷说的，把我唬糊涂了。”
paragraphs.english: Baoshan heard this and read it to Xueyi's mother one by one. Xueyi's mother wiped her tears and said, "It seems that life and death are not yet determined!" Baoshan said, "Mom, don't be sad first. Wait until you call the little servant to ask the details." She sent a little servant to call the little servant. Xueyi's mother asked the little servant, "Tell me the details of what big brother said that night." The little servant said, "I heard big brother and second brother talking that night, which made me confused."
paragraphs.chinese: 宝钗听了，逐个念给薛姨妈听。薛姨妈擦著眼泪，说道：“这样看起来，真是死活未定了！”宝钗道：“妈妈先别伤心，等著叫进小厮来问明了再说。”一面打发小丫头把小厮叫进来。薛姨妈便问小厮道：“你把大爷的事细说与我听听。”小厮道：“我那一天晚上，听见大爷和二爷说的，把我唬糊涂了。”

paragraphs.original: 未知小厮说出什么话来，下回分解。
paragraphs.english: I don't know what the little slave said, but I'll tell you next time.
paragraphs.chinese: 不知道小厮说了什么，下回再讲。
